sentences: Palacio was one of the backup singers for the vallenato group Binomio de Oro de America who joined in 2004 after many singers passed through the musical group.
Alejandro Manuel Palacio Zawady was born on June 5, 1985.
At the age of 8, Palacio knew how to play the guitar and started participating in several music festivals held in his native Santa Marta.
In 2012, Palacio was chosen to star in Rafael Orozco, el ídolo, a Colombian biographical telenovela produced by Asier Aguilar Amuchastegui for Caracol Televisión, as the titular character.
The series follows the life of Rafael Orozco Maestre in his romantic moments and why he was killed.
